channel.title: Urgent 508 problem Plz look
channel.description: [size=20pt][font=Georgia] I know this might be considered spam but its a good idea to use so people can play 508.[/font][/size]Look, for my computer and some other peoples computers, Clients have errors that wont let them run. 508 Clients are more space, and also probably wont run for me and others. So the best thing to do is to make a 508, and 503 webclient on MoparScape so we can play those servers.
